snippet.title: Ravenswatch | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to your wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2071280/

Ravenswatch is an isometric roguelike action game that combines intense real-time combat with deep gameplay and high replay value. After the success of Curse of the Dead Gods, Passtech returns with a new formula and game experience that can be played solo or with up to 4 players in co-op.

#Ravenswatch is being developed for PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and will be available in Early Access in 2023 on PC.
-------------------------------
